## ZKPPacker.(constructor)

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Creates an instance of ZKPPacker.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(provingParamsMap: Map<string, ProvingParams>, verificationParamsMap: Map<string, VerificationParams>);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  provingParamsMap | Map&lt;string, [ProvingParams](./js-sdk.provingparams.md)&gt; | string is derived by JSON.parse(ProvingMethodAlg) |
|  verificationParamsMap | Map&lt;string, [VerificationParams](./js-sdk.verificationparams.md)&gt; | string is derived by JSON.parse(ProvingMethodAlg) |
